properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_DISCOUNT ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,BRAND_NAME ,PRODUCT_VIEW_COUNT ,PRODUCT_IMG_SRC FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(CATEGORY_NO2 = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND IMG_TYPE = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_DISCOUNT ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,BRAND_NAME ,PRODUCT_VIEW_COUNT ,PRODUCT_IMG_SRC FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(CATEGORY_NO2 = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND IMG_TYPE = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRODUCT_VIEW_COUNT DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_DISCOUNT ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,BRAND_NAME ,PRODUCT_VIEW_COUNT ,PRODUCT_IMG_SRC FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(CATEGORY_NO2 = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND IMG_TYPE = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRODUCT_PRICE*((100-PRODUCT_DISCOUNT)*0.01)

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_DISCOUNT ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,BRAND_NAME ,PRODUCT_VIEW_COUNT ,PRODUCT_IMG_SRC FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY ON(CATEGORY_NO2 = CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_BRAND USING(BRAND_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND IMG_TYPE = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRODUCT_PRICE*((100-PRODUCT_DISCOUNT)*0.01) DESC
